attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For crimes against the country of Great Britain. For stealing £5 billion from pension funds, double taxing in the form of Inheritance tax, introducing a confusing tax system, scrapping the 10p tax rate thus consigning more poeple to poverty, helping inflation to reach nearly 3%, selling of our Gold Reserves, gross over spending on NHS and education, gross under spending on Defense and for introducing 100 new stealth taxes in 10 years.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/incomestealthtax/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
